text: “tavada mavada, mage dutayavada (obavada), visvasa karana men (havarihun vana obage) golayinta ma dænum dun avasthavedi ovun “(e andamatama) api visvasa kalemu. niyata vasayenma api (obata sampurnayenma avanata vi sitina) muslimvarun bavata obama saksi vasayen sitinu mænava!” yayi pævasimada, sita balanu” (yayida edina pavasanu æta)
